net.datacrow.core.services

Class Servers

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.datacrow.core.services.Servers

  • public class Servers
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to register all the found servers in the services folder. The ServiceClassLoader is used to located these servers.
    Author:
    Robert Jan van der Waals

      • getOnlineServices

        public OnlineServices getOnlineServices(int moduleIdx)
        Retrieves all the servers for the given module.
        Parameters:
        module -

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Starts the search for the servers using the ServiceClassLoader. The services folder is scanned for both jar and class files. Any class implementing the IServer class is registered.

        public static Servers getInstance()
        Returns an instance of this class.
